description: This table maps trip end reason IDs to their respective reason description (based on https://github.com/samsara-dev/backend/blob/master/go/src/samsaradev.io/stats/trips/tripsproto/trips.proto)

schema.name: trip_end_reason_id
schema.description: The id of the trip end reason.

schema.name: trip_end_reason
schema.description: The name of the trip end reason.
